title: How to Make Boiled Custard

steps.headline: Put the yolks of the eggs into a basin and whisk them.
Put the milk into a saucepan, and when it is boiling pour it over the eggs, stirring all the time.
Strain back into the saucepan and when it comes to the boiling point; draw away from the heat, but continue whisking for a few minutes.
Pour into a basin, sweeten and flavour to taste, and it is ready for use.

text: Put the yolks of the eggs into a basin and whisk them.  Put the milk into a saucepan, and when it is boiling pour it over the eggs, stirring all the time.  Strain back into the saucepan and when it comes to the boiling point; draw away from the heat, but continue whisking for a few minutes.  Pour into a basin, sweeten and flavour to taste, and it is ready for use.
